entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
